pages.title: 致同行者,
pages.text: 白手起家，并非易事。如天时而地利，与自然和谐共处似顺风顺水；可当日落西山，夜幕垂笼，自然，却将变得极难于窥测。$(br2)你的工具大可以任你操使，但请谨记：秉承责任之心，崇敬自然万物！
欲望是人的天性，饥饿则是欲望最原始的根源。无论处境多么艰难，那一捧微微焙烤过的种子，总能给你最简单的安慰与寄托。

pages.title: 野根
pages.text: 我对$(l:herbs/wildroot)野根$()有着较为深入的研究，这一奇异的，魔力充盈的根茎于地中杂乱生长，又或者潜匿在繁密的高草丛之间。$(br2)许久以前，它曾是一种名为“野木“的巨树之根。虽再也无法在这片大地上得见当年野木，但它留存于世的根茎却仍生机盎然。$(br2)与其它作物一样，野根可以在潮湿的耕地中生长。

pages.title: 茄子
pages.text: $(l:resources/aubergine)茄子$()，这种不起眼的植物，可单独烹制，亦可与其它其它蔬菜结合，细细烹调，亦为美味佳肴。$(br2)它所蕴藏的魔力较为微弱，但仍会是一些咒术及仪式中不可或缺的一员。与野根一样，茄子也可以种植与耕地上。

pages.title: 大地孢子
pages.text: The $(l:herbs/terra_moss)strange spores$() which may be found in tall grass grow best when placed on rough stone near water. When scraped away carefully with a knife, it is clear that magic suffuses them.$(br2)However, fear not that you will spend your days breaking grass in search of spores, for there is a ritual, that of $(l:rituals/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrowth$(), which will magically grow this moss on suitable stone.

pages.title: 其它作物
pages.text: Fear not sacrificing the space around you for the cultivation of other crops, such as wheat or carrots. These will give you sustenance, and, you may find others like you in the world willing to trade their currency for your goods.$(br2)A well-kept garden will forever be a boon to you, and you might eventually find $(l:apparatus/runestone)a means to keep away trampling animals & monsters$().

pages.title: 其它德鲁伊
pages.text: Indeed, within these encampments you may find like-minded druids more progressed in the arts, who may be willing to trade essential items and resources in return for this currency.$(br2)This may give you a needed boost in resources, or perhaps, if discovered early enough, unlock new ideas and concepts. Some of them may even be willing to trade away their most valuable items!

pages.title: 稀有资源
pages.text: My research into the various spells & rituals has found that some require rare resources, be they from tropical climes, the wettest swamps or from the driest deserts.$(br2)Being older, I was unable to make such a journey, but have heard tell of a $(l:rituals/ritual_transmutation)ritual that harnesses runestones to turn mundane things into others$().$(br2)However, none of the texts available to me detailed it.

As I have mentioned my advancing years, the passage of time begins to feel like a closing loop that will end my current cycle on the land.$(br2)There have been times when I have had not had time to wait for crop to ripen, and at a lack of the common fertilizer which all herbs seem to respond to.$(br2)In these times of need, I found the $(l:spells/spell_growth_infusion)Spell of Growth Infusion$() useful, though tedious by nature.

Other texts speak of greater spells & rituals to grow entire fields & forests, and others yet to harvest them, but these are beyond my meagre skills. Perhaps you will succeed where I could not.$(br2)$(br2)Some final words: never despair! If you find yourself at a loss, and my words unable to help, ensure every avenue of research has been exhausted.$(br2)Often frustrations are eased by unlocking a new herb.

Fare the well, my friend! Although I will not live to see it, I know that even in your darkest moments there will be such sources of light and understanding that I cannot even comprehend them.$(br2)$(br2)- $(o)the name is too faded to read$()
